snippet: Turner Sports, CBS’s partner in carrying the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament, could carry the Final Four and national championship game in 2014, instead of 2016 as originally envisioned.
abstract: Turner Sports, CBS’ partner in carrying the NCAA men’s basketball tournament, could carry the Final Four and national championship game in 2014, instead of 2016 as originally envisioned.
lead_paragraph: Turner Sports, CBS’s partner in carrying the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament, could carry the Final Four and national championship game in 2014, instead of 2016 as originally envisioned.

headline.seo: Turner May Broadcast 2014 Men’s Final Four
headline.main: Turner May Broadcast 2014 Men’s Final Four
